name: zyn-cpp-bootstrap
description: Portable toolchain installer for zynC++ (clang/clangd, cmake, ninja, vcpkg, conan)

scripts.build: esbuild src/installer.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/installer.js && esbuild src/cli.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/cli.js && esbuild src/extension.ts --bundle --platform=node --external:vscode --outfile=dist/extension.js
